contentBlocks.title: General Pool Heater Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heater timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heater timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool heater timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool heater timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool heater timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool heater timers must be installed by a qualified person.
